entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
